sentences.en: " Did you see by the paper they are going to call out the militia? "
sentences.cn: “ 你看到报上说他们要出动国民警卫队了 吗 ?

sentences.en: " Is the militia really going to be called out?
sentences.cn: " 难道民兵真的要调出去?

sentences.en: " They've got the militia on their side, " he thought. " There isn't anything those men can do. "
sentences.cn: “ 他们有国民警卫队站在他们一边, " 他想, " 那些工人是毫无办法的.

sentences.en: He joined the local militia as soon as he was 16.
sentences.cn: 他一到16岁就加入了当地民兵队伍。

sentences.en: Militia leaders had halted overland food convoys in the region.
sentences.cn: 民兵首领已拦阻了该地区经由陆上运送食品的车队。

sentences.en: Off to one side, the militia was heaping up wood for a bonfire.
sentences.cn: 在一侧，民兵们正在堆起木柴，准备生起篝火。

sentences.en: Our militia fired off volley after volley from antiaircraft artillery.
sentences.cn: 我民兵的高射炮连续射击.

sentences.en: Scarlett tiptoed above the crowd and saw the captain of the militia mounting the orchestra platform.
sentences.cn: 思嘉踮起脚尖从一群人头上望去,只见民团队长正登上乐队演奏台.

sentences.en: That morning they reviewed the armed forces and the militia.
sentences.cn: 这天早上,他们检阅了武装部队和民兵.

sentences.en: The militia in Lebanon has agreed to pull out of Beirut.
sentences.cn: 黎巴嫩的民兵组织已经同意从贝鲁特撤出。

sentences.en: The militia is / are sometimes used for dealing with riots.
sentences.cn: 民兵有时会用来对付骚乱.

sentences.en: The militia responded by saying it would retaliate against any attacks.
sentences.cn: 民兵组织回复说他们会对任何进攻予以反击。

sentences.en: There's a building guarded by the local militia at the corner of the street.
sentences.cn: 街道拐角处有一幢由当地民兵团守卫的大楼.

sentences.en: Under militia's the the pursuing and attacking, gangsters escaping the remote mountains.
sentences.cn: 在民兵们的追击下, 匪徒们逃进了深山.

sentences.en: You son of a bitch, they're about to call the militia.
sentences.cn: 你这个混蛋, 他们快要叫民警来了.

trans.tran_en: a group of people trained as soldiers, who are not part of the permanent army
